def calculate_customer_costs(n, m, a, c, orders):
    c = [0] - c
    a = [0] + a
    o = [[c[i], a[i]] for i in range(1, n + 1)]
    o = [[0, 0]] + o
    p = [[c[i], i] for i in range(0, n + 1)]
    p.sort()
    result = []
    for order in orders:
        (t_j, d_j) = order
        r = 0
        s = 1
        if o[t_j][1] >= d_j:
            o[t_j][1] -= d_j
            r += o[t_j][0] * d_j
        else:
            d_j -= o[t_j][1]
            r += o[t_j][0] * o[t_j][1]
            o[t_j][1] = 0
            while d_j > 0:
                if s < n + 1:
                    if d_j > o[p[s][1]][1]:
                        d_j -= o[p[s][1]][1]
                        r += o[p[s][1]][1] * p[s][0]
                        o[p[s][1]][1] = 0
                        s += 1
                    elif d_j < o[p[s][1]][1]:
                        o[p[s][1]][1] -= d_j
                        r += d_j * p[s][0]
                        d_j = 0
                    else:
                        o[p[s][1]][1] = 0
                        r += d_j * p[s][0]
                        d_j = 0
                        s += 1
                else:
                    r = 0
                    break
        result.append(r)
    return result
